title: Hurling
data:
{{version030}}
{{flavour|It improves your effectiveness with thrown weapons, such as rocks and javelins (Slay+4).}}

'''Hurling''' is an [[ego]] found only on [[gloves]] that enhances your ability to fight with [[Throwing#Weapons|throwing weapons]], reciving a +4 [[slaying]] bonus.

==Desirability==
Slaying bonuses are always desirable, but not all characters wind up using throwing weapons. Spellcasters would likely prefer gloves of [[strength]] or [[dexterity]], while [[ranged weapon]] wielders might find them unnecessary.

==History==
*Hurling was introduced in [[0.28]], replacing the [[archery]] ego.
